scripts.python:run: cd python && pip3 install -r python_requirements.txt && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) python3 -m pytest -s -v ./test/coverage/generic --rootdir=./test --junitxml=./coverage-test-report.xml
scripts.python:run:parallel: cd python && pip3 install -r python_requirements.txt && APPLITOOLS_BATCH_ID=$(uuidgen) python3 -m pytest -v -n 10 ./test/coverage/generic --rootdir=./test --junitxml=./coverage-test-report.xml
scripts.python:report: [ "$TEST_REPORT_SANDBOX" = "False" ] && npm run python:report:prod || npm run python:report:sandbox
